newsitem.title: USA: Archer Daniels Midland Q1 Sept 30 net down.
newsitem.headline: Archer Daniels Midland Q1 Sept 30 net down.

text.p: (All Data Above 000s Except Per Share Numbers)

NOTE: Q1 1996 is after $0.32 a share charge for fines and litigation settlements arising from U.S. lysine and citric acid antiturst investigation, as well as resolution of securities suit brought by shareholders. 1996 earnings also include $0.03 a share gains from securities transaction and income from commodity price decreases on LIFO inventory valuations of $0.10 a share.
First quarter 1995 earnings include $0.02 a share charge for the effect of commodity price increases on LIFO inventory valuations and $0.02 a gain from sale of Supreme Sugar subsidiary.
